titles.title: Unlocking Native Lands and Opportunities for Commerce and Key Economic Developments Act of 2025
Unlocking Native Lands and Opportunities for Commerce and Key Economic Developments Act of 2025
A bill to amend the Act of August 9, 1955, to make improvements to that Act, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Indian Affairs.
Committee on Indian Affairs. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
